title: Docker Kubernetes Training
description: Docker Kubernetes Training from Mindmajix develops the skills required in building, testing, and deploying Docker applications with Kubernetes. First, the course provides basic fundamental knowledge of docker. Next, deep dives into inner workings of containers, docker CLI commands, docker monitoring, Kubernetes commands, and much more. This online training also provides practical experience through real-time projects to expand your skill set.
instructor_bio: Having 20+ years of experience working closely with industry, Prashanth is one of the best-certified trainers of MindMajix. He has bagged Kubernetes, Docker and can deliver the best technology to our trainees.
review|1|review: Recently I joined Docker Kubernetes Training Provided by Mindmajix. Training has been organised well by the supporting team, and they have conducted regular follow-ups regarding the training.
review|2|review: I enrolled in the Docker Kubernetes training offered by Mindmajix. The trainer explained every topic until I understood it. This training helped me in getting the Docker Kubernetes certification.
review|3|review: Mindmajix is the BEST online training platform for all software programs courses including latest technologies. I have attended Docker kubernetes Course and I learned a lot form this course.

short_description: Leverage the growing demand for Certified Docker Kubernetes Professionals

title: Docker Training and Certification Course Online
description: Mindmajix Docker Training features the foundational concepts and practices of Docker, including container orchestration, scaling docker across multiple nodes in a cluster, and much more. Our Docker Certified Associate (DCA) online course enhances your knowledge with the core fundamentals of Docker like  Docker Hub, Docker Swarm, Dockerfile, data management, networking capabilities, building containers, and more related concepts with the best practices.
what_will_learn: |Basics of virtualization|Basics of Docker and its architecture, and various terminologies related to it|Perform various operations on containers|Gain knowledge on various networking mechanisms available in Docker|Get a brief idea about the configuration of the Docker daemon|Deploy various Container based Applications on the Cloud|
prerequisites:
What are the prerequisites for the Docker course?The prerequisite for learning the Docker course is:

The participant should be familiar with the Linux commands.
target_students: |Systems Admins|Web Developers|Application Developers|Testers|Solutions Architects|Release Engineers|Cloud Professionals|
instructor_bio: Having 20+ years of experience working closely with industry, Prashanth is one of the best-certified trainers of MindMajix. He has bagged Docker and can deliver the best technology to our trainees.
review|1|review: I have joined for Docker Training at Mindmajix. Thank you Mindmajix for awesome co-ordination. The training was very good and the trainer is so cooperative.
review|2|review: This was my first Online training. I am very satisfied with the Docker training methodologies, and gained valuable knowledge about the entire course. Thank You Mindmajix!!
review|3|review: The Docker training and trainer knowledge are so excellent and satisfied me. Thank you Mindmajix.

title: OpenShift Training
description: OpenShift training classes from Mindmajix provide you in-depth knowledge on all the key features and fundamentals of OpenShift. The course introduces containers, Kubernetes, Red Hat OpenShift Container Platform, and builds core knowledge to manage containers with hands-on exercises. Through this training, you will work on real-time projects which are primarily inline with the OpenShift Certification Exam.
what_will_learn: |Install, configure, and manage containers|Create containerized services using Docker|Manage containers and container images|Create custom container images|Design, build, and deploy containerized applications on an OpenShift cluster|Deploy multi-container applications|
prerequisites:
What are the prerequisites for the OpenShift course?The prerequisites for learning OpenShift are listed below:

The participant should have knowledge on the basics of containers, Kubernetes, and OpenShift.
The participant should have experience in Enterprise Linux system administration.
target_students: |System administrators|Developers |Architects |Cloud administrators|Professionals who want to enhance their skills in OpenShift Container Platform.|
review|1|review: The instructor has a good knowledge of the application platform which made easy for me. He has insisted on writing code rather than build & deploy the app. Hence it is a build & deploys process.
review|2|review: I enrolled last month and have finished the course. As a working person, they have given me an exposure to the domain. But also helped me in learning the cross technologies.
review|3|review: At work, I have recently started a project with Openshift & I have all there in this course online, I have enjoyed the course. Thanks Mindmajix.
short_description: Leverage the growing demand for Certified OpenShift Professionals

title: Kubernetes Training and Certification Course in New York
description:
Become an expert in container orchestration by enrolling into Mindmajix Kubernetes training in New York. Our experienced trainer will make you understand the concepts from the basic to advanced level.  This training will provide you in-depth knowledge of the concepts such as Kubernetes architecture, app deployment on Kubernetes cluster, components of Kubernetes, best security practises in Kubernetes, Kubernetes dashboard, Pods, and a lot more other topics. 

As a part of the training, you will be working with real-time projects and use cases to gain practical exposure. Learn from the industry professionals by joining Mindmajix Kubernetes certification course in New York.
prerequisites:
Who should take up this Kubernetes Online Certification Course?




Following are the job roles who can advance in their career by learning this course. 

Solution Architects
System Admins
Software Testers
IT Professionals
Security Engineers

title: OpenShift Administration Training
description: Mindmajix OpenShift Administration training is designed to develop the skills necessary to administer and operate OpenShift clusters. It will enable you to master all the fundamentals of OpenShift Container platform through practical sessions and also provides exposure to real-time use cases and projects. These skills will help you to clear the OpenShift Administration certification exam.
what_will_learn: |Install and configure the OpenShift Container and Platform clusters|Control and secure access to resources |Configure and manage OpenShift masters, nodes, services, pods, secrets, and routes|Deploy applications on OpenShift using Source-to-Image (S2I)|
prerequisites:
What are the prerequisites for the Openshift Administration course?




The following are the prerequisites for learning this course:
Basic knowledge of,

Linux framework 
Containers
Kubernetes
Red Hat OpenShift (DO180)
OpenShift fundamentals.
instructor_bio: Passion towards teaching made Gaurav share the industrial experience he has got for further generations. He has got a total of three years into the real-time industrial background and has trained over 250+ students.
